Linking specifications together

Once you have written all your specifications, the question naturally arises, how do I navigate them? Concordion provides breadcrumbs which help navigate back up a tree, but relies on manual links to provide further details. SpecLinker expands on breadcrumb format automatically populating index pages with links to their children, and highlighting these links based on the test results.

Given a directory example with files Example.html and MoreExampleDetails.html

When I run the SpecLinker

Then Example.html will be interpreted as an index and contain a link to MoreExampleDetails.html
